definition: again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
Time that has passed will never come back. (idiom)

pinyin: ji1 bu4 ke3 shi1 , shi1 bu4 zai4 lai2
ji1 bu4 ke3 shi1 , shi2 bu4 zai4 lai2

definition: lit. one's youth will never return/to make the most of one's opportunities (idiom)

sentences.english: Non-codependent love requires wholeness to emerge within.
sentences.chinese: 不再相互依賴的愛，需要從內在出現完整。

sentences.english: Farmers didn't have to scrambled to plant common vegetables this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年農民不再一窩蜂似的種大路菜了。

sentences.english: The justice ' clerk assert that the justice is functi officio.
sentences.chinese: 法官的祕書宣稱法官已不再有管轄權。

sentences.english: Thank god I no longer feel this erotic desire.
sentences.chinese: 感謝主，我已不再有性慾望了。

sentences.english: This branch is obsoleted. Engineering resource will no longer be invested on this branch in general.
sentences.chinese: 此分支已淘汰，除特殊狀況人力不再投注於此版上。

sentences.english: Killing the slaver overseer no longer results in karma loss.
sentences.chinese: 殺死口水監督員在業虧損不再結果。

sentences.english: Rain and snow don't penalize your Spot and Search checks.
sentences.chinese: 你的偵察和搜尋檢定不再因雨和雪受到處罰。

sentences.english: This god was not identified with nature.
sentences.chinese: 上帝已經不再等同於自然了。

sentences.english: There was no longer any question of discovering a posteriori laws of social change.
sentences.chinese: 之後便不再有有關社會變革的法則出現。

sentences.english: This is not the case with Kanban.
sentences.chinese: 有了看板，這不再是問題。

sentences.english: "Sap" no longer removes you from stealth when used.
sentences.chinese: “悶棍”不再在使用後將你移出的潛行狀態。

sentences.english: The Compound regular Team Round will not use the set system either.
sentences.chinese: 複合弓的團體比賽也不再將採用局勝制。

sentences.english: Jewish holy sites were not maintained, and their cemeteries had been desecrated .
sentences.chinese: 因此猶太人的聖地不再得到維護，墓園被褻瀆。

sentences.english: Our goal is an Iraq that no longer needs American troops.
sentences.chinese: 我們的目標是讓伊拉克不再需要美國的軍隊。

sentences.english: Those who have gone back to non-industrialized sections of the country will not be net consumers at all.
sentences.chinese: 那些回到農村的人將不再是淨消費者。

sentences.english: Small rooms are no longer crowded.

definition: need not/does not have to/not necessarily
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to change into/to turn into/to become
improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
